content: 1 stitch 1dc into next stitch* repeat to the ch2 space ch1 1dc ch2 1dc into the ch2 space ch1 1dc into the next stitch *ch1 skip 1 stitch 1dc into the next stitch* repeat to the ch4 space ch1 1dc 1tr into the top of the ch4 in the row below turn 1 ch4 space 1 treble_crochet 50 double_crochet 48 ch1 space 1 ch2 space row 13 ch4 1dc into the first stitch at the base of the ch4 ch1 1dc into next stitch *ch1 skip 1 stitch 1dc into next stitch* repeat to the ch2 space ch1 1dc ch2 1dc into the ch2 space ch1 1dc into the next stitch *ch1 skip 1 stitch 1dc into the next stitch* repeat to the ch4 space ch1 1dc 1tr into the top of the ch4 in the row below turn 1 ch4 space 1 treble_crochet 54 double_crochet 52 ch1 space 1 ch2 space row 14 ch4 1dc into the first stitch at the base of the ch4 ch1 1dc into next stitch *ch1 skip 1 stitch 1dc into next stitch* repeat to the ch2 space ch1 1dc ch2 1dc into the ch2 space ch1 1dc into the next stitch *ch1 skip 1 stitch 1dc into the next stitch* repeat to the ch4 space ch1 1dc 1tr into the top of the ch4 in the row below turn 1 ch4 space 1 treble_crochet 58 double_crochet 56 ch1 space 1 ch2 space row 15 ch4 2dc into the first stitch at the base of the ch4 1dc into the next stitch *1dc into ch1 space 1dc into the next stitch* repeat to the ch2 space 2dc ch2 2dc into the ch2 space 1dc into the next stitch *1dc into ch1 space 1dc into the next stitch* repeat to the ch4 space 2dc 1tr into the top of the ch4 in the row below turn 1 ch4 space 1 treble_crochet 122 double_crochet 1 ch2 space row 16-71 repeat row 2-15 4 times row 72 repeat row 2 once border row ch4 p 2dc into the first stitch at the base of the ch4 *double_crochet into the next stitch p dc2 into each of the next stitch* repeat to the ch2 space 2dc ch1 p ch1 2dc into the ch2 space *double_crochet into the next stitch p dc2 into each of the next stitch* repeat to the last stitch before the ch4 space double_crochet into the next stitch p 2dc 1tr into the top of the ch4 in the row below p finishing cut yarn and hide its tip wash in warm water block to final measurements let dry completely © yulia tkachenko semklita s stitch 2018 @semklitas_stitch
